name: Lynx 134
description: The 134 Lynx knife combines practical features with stunning details. This impressive knife is perfect for any outdoors person or
The handle is made of waxed curly birch – the cast finger guard adds a hint of luxury. The blade is made of practical stainless chrome steel. A durable and beautiful leather sheath is included.
The same knife is available also with a different sheath design :
